name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Latest flagship smartphone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, and advanced camera system featuring 5x telephoto zoom.

name: Samsung 65-inch QLED 4K Smart TV
description: Premium smart TV with Quantum Dot technology, HDR10+ support, and built-in streaming apps for ultimate entertainment.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling headphones with 30-hour battery life and premium sound quality.

name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
description: Ultra-portable laptop with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and stunning InfinityEdge display.

name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High
description: Classic basketball sneakers with premium leather construction and iconic silhouette in Chicago colorway.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22 Running Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes with responsive Boost midsole and Primeknit upper for ultimate comfort.

name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
description: Iconic straight-leg jeans made from premium denim with classic five-pocket styling and button fly.

name: The North Face Venture 2 Jacket
description: Waterproof and breathable rain jacket perfect for outdoor adventures with adjustable hood and ventilation.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer
description: Professional-grade 5-quart stand mixer with 10 speeds and tilt-head design, includes three attachments.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Pressure Cooker
description: Multi-functional electric pressure cooker that replaces 7 kitchen appliances with smart programming.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
description: Advanced cordless vacuum with laser dust detection and powerful suction for deep cleaning.

name: Ninja Foodi Personal Blender
description: Portable blender with extraction blades for smoothies and protein shakes with travel cups included.

name: Weber Spirit II E-210 Gas Grill
description: Compact 2-burner gas grill perfect for small spaces with porcelain-enameled cast iron cooking grates.

name: Coleman Sundome 4-Person Tent
description: Easy-setup camping tent with weather-resistant fabric and spacious interior for comfortable outdoor sleeping.

name: Yeti Rambler 20oz Tumbler
description: Double-wall vacuum insulated stainless steel tumbler that keeps drinks hot or cold for hours.

name: Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, and stress management tools.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Most advanced Apple Watch with faster S9 chip, brighter display, and comprehensive health monitoring.

name: Kindle Paperwhite E-Reader
description: Waterproof e-reader with 6.8-inch glare-free display and adjustable warm light for comfortable reading.

name: JBL Charge 5 Portable Speaker
description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound, 20-hour battery life, and built-in power bank.

name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Jacket
description: Sustainable fleece jacket made from recycled polyester with classic full-zip design and comfortable fit.

name: Stanley Adventure Quencher Tumbler 40oz
description: Insulated stainless steel tumbler with handle and straw for all-day hydration and temperature retention.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic Sunglasses
description: Iconic aviator sunglasses with crystal lenses and gold frame, offering 100% UV protection.

name: Hydro Flask Standard Mouth Water Bottle
description: Double-wall vacuum insulated water bottle that keeps beverages cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Allbirds Tree Runners Sneakers
description: Sustainable sneakers made from eucalyptus tree fiber with comfortable fit and machine-washable design.

name: Anker PowerCore 10000 Portable Charger
description: Compact portable charger with 10000mAh capacity and fast-charging technology for smartphones and tablets.
